docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. 四级标题 mkdocs help - Print this help message.
docs.title: PYTHON基础

docs.title: 四级标题

docs.text: 1 环境使用Mdocs文档编辑 1.2 二级标题 1.2.1 三级标题 1.2.2 三级标题 ceshi 1.1 ceshi 插入表格 如果您愿意，可以在表格的每一行添加一个前导和尾随管道： 名称 | 内容 | 描述 ------------ | ------------- | ------------ Content Cell | Content Cell | Content Cell Content Cell | Content Cell | Content Cell 如果您愿意，可以在表格的每一行添加一个前导和尾随管道： First Header | Second Header | Third Header :----------- |:-------------:| -----------: Left | Center | Right Left | Center | Right 插入代码 Fenced code blocks are like Standard Markdown’s regular code blocks, except that they’re not indented and instead rely on start and end fence lines to delimit the code block. def fn(): pass Title: My Document Summary: A brief description of my document. Authors: Waylan Limberg Tom Christie Date: January 23, 2018 blank-value: some_url: https://example.com This is the first paragraph of the document. $ python --version Python 2.7.14 $ pip --version pip 18.1 from /usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pip (python 2.7) !!! Note If you are using Windows, some of the above commands may not work out-of-the-box.
docs.title: PYTHON中级

docs.text: 如果您愿意，可以在表格的每一行添加一个前导和尾随管道： 名称 | 内容 | 描述 ------------ | ------------- | ------------ Content Cell | Content Cell | Content Cell Content Cell | Content Cell | Content Cell 如果您愿意，可以在表格的每一行添加一个前导和尾随管道： First Header | Second Header | Third Header :----------- |:-------------:| -----------: Left | Center | Right Left | Center | Right 插入代码 Fenced code blocks are like Standard Markdown’s regular code blocks, except that they’re not indented and instead rely on start and end fence lines to delimit the code block. def fn(): pass Title: My Document Summary: A brief description of my document. Authors: Waylan Limberg Tom Christie Date: January 23, 2018 blank-value: some_url: https://example.com This is the first paragraph of the document. $ python --version Python 2.7.14 $ pip --version pip 18.1 from /usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/pip (python 2.7) !!! Note If you are using Windows, some of the above commands may not work out-of-the-box.
